body: This simple silk vest looks nondescript, but is actually studded with numerous secret pockets sewn into its lining. Hidden inside these are magic lockpicks that provide a +4 competence bonus on Disable Device checks. The vest also grants its wearer a +6 competence bonus on Escape Artist checks.
name: Vest of Escape
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Chest/Chest Slot Wondrous Items/Vest of Escape
